author: admin
title: Dena Bank Jobs 2017 Recruitment of Officer/Manager & Other Vacancy Advt
text: Specialist Officers Vital Criterion : Candidates who are going to apply for the Assistant General Manager should have Bachelor of Engineering or Master of Computer Applications (MCA) with Certified Information System Auditor (CISA) certification or CISSP certification from (ISC)2 or CISM Certification of ISACA. Candidates applying for the rest of the positions must possess 10th Pass with Diploma or graduation from recognized university or institutions. Check Also: Jobs By Qualification Age Requirements : Contenders who are going to apply for the said posts must not be above 45 Years of age as on the last date of applying. Relaxation in age will be offered to reserved candidates as per the rules of bank. Remuneration : Candidates who will be finalizing for the positions will get the inclusive amount of salary as decided by the selection team of organization. Grab Info About: Dena Bank Salaries Selection Procedure : Candidates will be selected on the basis of their performance in personal Interview. Interview is going to be conducted by the selection panel of the Bank. No TA/DA will be paid for attending interview. Only those candidates who meet the minimum eligibility criteria is called for the selection process. How to apply for Dena Bank Recruitment ? First of all, contenders may visit to the official website of the bank that is “www.denabank.com”. Now go to the “Recruitment” button mentioned on the top of the homepage and press on it. After that, hit on the relevant link of advertisement. Now press “Download Details”. Here is the advertisement, read it carefully. Now download the application form. Fill the application form with correct information in prescribed manner. Attach all the important documents and certificates along with the application form. Then enclose the application form in envelope and super scribed with the “Name of the Position____
